select ID,PID,name as TEXT,mobile HREF,0 CHILD_COUNT,'closed' STATE from student t where t.classId=#{classId} UNION ALL select t.ID,t.PID,t.name as TEXT,null HREF,(select count(1) from student a where a.classId=#{classId} and a.pid=t.id) CHILD_COUNT,'closed' STATE from mail_list t
